p:
Refinements of structural models including simulation of termination ripples were performed with the PDFgui software
32 . A fit to the CeO 2 PDF with a fixed structural model was used to extract the instrument-sensitive parameters Q damp = 0.0475(4) Å −1 and Q broad = 0.0186(3) Å −1. It was not possible to minimise the value of f V directly in the refinements and so the best-fit value was found by comparing Rws for the seven structural models with varying fixed f V values.
